name: InstalliOSProvisioningProfile
description: Install an iOS provisioning profile requried to build an iOS app on the Mac build server
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Download and install the provisioning profile

inputs.name: provisioningProfile
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provisioning Profile uploaded to `Secure Files` on Visual Studio Team Services that should be installed on the Mac build agent.

inputs.name: removeProfile
inputs.label: Remove Profile After Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to specify that the Provisioning Profile should be removed from the build agent after the build is complete.
